spear +32,
**Damage** 2d6+8 piercing plus 1d6 chaotic (against lawful creatures)

**Divine Spells Prepared** DC 36, attack +26
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **6th**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (x3), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 36
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (to any location in Armag's Tomb)
- **2nd**
[Augury](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) (x3), [Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=174) (x3)
- **3rd**
[Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7) (x3)
- **5th**
[Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19)

**Blessed Life**   Zorek does not age or breathe, and he doesn't need to eat, drink, or sleep.

**Divine Font**   heal

**Divine Recovery** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** Zorek fails a saving throw; **Effect** Zorek loses all negative conditions he is currently affected by and may attempt a new saving throw against the effect that triggered Divine Recovery. His armor and weapons glow with blood-red light when he uses this ability.

</column>
